entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 28. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Clearing after midnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Saturday 25 March 2023
